title: Transformers UK Comics (Complete & Remastered)
description:
File format .CBZ

Every single UK comic digitally remastered. The comics were originally uploaded by another user a few years ago, however they were plain scans and were showing signs of ageing/yellowing. Applied contrast filters to remove the yellowing and boosted the saturation on each page. Also horizontally aligned all the pages and cropped the borders.

Perhaps most importantly the issues have been grouped by year and story arc, making for much easier reading without having to flip constantly between .CBZ files.

This collection only contains the story content and comic covers, so all the extra stuff (Combat Colin/Action Force etc) has been stripped out, so this collection might not be suitable for everyone, just those really interested in an uninterrupted reading experience.

The quality of the comics is variable, but far better than their source. Some of the older comics are lower resolution than I'd like but are still perfectly readable. I've tried the UK reissues on Kindle and personally I find these CBZ files much more readable.

Hope you enjoy!! BTW if you'd like me to upload these elsewhere then let me know, as seeding may be slow at first
